duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate Telecom Solutions to address business needs including planning, designing, implementing, testing, and documenting communication systems & network components.
Understand SONET and Ethernet connections, BLSR/UPSR SONET ring protection, G.8032 Ethernet Protection schemes, fiber optics, and pluggables.

Develop plans and engineering job packages with detailed parts/equipment lists, logical installation instructions, and appropriate documentation to support efficient installation and maintenance process.
Work effectively with team members to implement transport projects and monitor installation work to ensure compliance with regulations and standards.
Resolve complex technical problems, provide technical assistance to installation and maintenance personnel, and ensure Telecom Change Management related to project work.
Maintain familiarity with current telecommunications technology and available facilities, leveraging more effective or emerging technologies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Telecommunications, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
